name: Olukai Alapa Li Shoes - Men's
description: Designed to pay tribute to the Hawaiian active lifestyle. The Ālapa Lī convertible slides are great for lake side campgrounds where one minute you’re in the water, the next you’ll be hitting the trails. The Drop-In Heel® is easy to slide into and can be tipped up when style or comfort dictates.Breathable mesh upper helps keep your feet cool and dries quickly.Drop-In Heel means you can wear these as slides or step-in shoes.Removeable and washable dual density gel insole has an antimicrobial textile cover.Compression molded EVA midsole offers all-day support.Non-marking outsole uses Olukai’s wet grip rubber to offer enhanced traction on wet surfaces.A portion of all proceeds directly supports the Ama OluKai Foundation, honouring those who preserve and celebrate the cultural heritage and Aloha spirit of Hawai‘i.
